With feet together, drop back (to 6 o'clock) with your left foot (into a right neutral bow) your left arm pins your opponent's arms while simultaneously delivering a right upward forearm against opponent's elbow joints.
Immediately shift your left foot counterclockwise to 4 o'clock as you cock and deliver a back knuckle strike to opponent's floating ribs.
Follow-up with a right inward strike to both arms of opponent, striking them diagonally to the left.
Deliver a right outward chop to opponent's throat.
Right front crossover and cover out to 4 o'clock.
